title: shrI vaTukanAtha
sahitya:
shrI vaTukanAtha shiva sanjAta dayAkara Damaru bhAsvara


anupallavi

 dEva dEvakriyA shakti sahita bhakta vihita bhUvalaya 
rakSaNa vicakSaNa bhUta bhEtALAdi rakSaNa


caraNam   kAla kAlabhairava brahma kapAla shUladharaphAla nayana 
kSEtra pAla sadguNa shIla bhayankara jvAlAmukha hAlAhala 
mUlAshana kOlAhala nIlakaNTha subAla guruguha lOla lIlAjAla pAlaya
